formElement.label: Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of project in which the application or the services will be created.

formElement.label: Create application-scoped microservices:
formElement.documentation: Whether all the services defined in the Docker Compose file should be created within one application in ElectricFlow. If checked, then the application name must be provided.

formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the application to create, within which the microservices will be created. Required if 'Create application-scoped microservices' is checked.

formElement.label: Environment Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of project that the environment belongs to.

formElement.label: Environment Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the environment containing the cluster where the newly created microservice(s) will be deployed.

formElement.label: Cluster Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the EC-Docker backed cluster within the environment where the newly created microservice(s) will be deployed.
